UniprotID	Q7LGA3
Accession	Q7LGA3;D3DT22;O75036;Q32NB5;Q8TAC5;Q9H441;Q9NUJ9
EntryName	HS2ST_HUMAN
ProteinName	Heparan sulfate 2-O-sulfotransferase 1 (2-O-sulfotransferase) (2OST) (EC 2.8.2.-)
GeneName	HS2ST1 HS2ST KIAA0448
Length	356
Function	Catalyzes the transfer of sulfate to the C2-position of selected hexuronic acid residues within the maturing heparan sulfate (HS). Mediates 2-O-sulfation of both L-iduronyl and D-glucuronyl residues. 2-O-sulfation within HS, particularly of iduronate residues, is essential for HS to participate in a variety of high-affinity ligand-binding interactions and signaling processes. Required for metanephric development of kidney formation, suggesting that 2-O-sulfation within HS is essential for signaling between ureteric bud and metanephric mesenchyme.
Subcellular Location	Golgi apparatus membrane
Disorder	0.1914,0.1184,0.1702,0.1137,0.0780,0.0835,0.0662,0.0531,0.0581,0.0364,0.0398,0.0327,0.0275,0.0364,0.0372,0.0198,0.0214,0.0281,0.0398,0.0341,0.0171,0.0181,0.0287,0.0171,0.0281,0.0494,0.0592,0.0909,0.1323,0.1528,0.1731,0.2064,0.2783,0.2783,0.2258,0.2783,0.3840,0.4685,0.4725,0.3840,0.3807,0.4864,0.3872,0.3983,0.4940,0.4864,0.4801,0.4831,0.4369,0.4409,0.4409,0.5577,0.5456,0.5493,0.5951,0.6712,0.7163,0.5951,0.5992,0.5951,0.7036,0.7120,0.7036,0.7595,0.6531,0.5211,0.4186,0.3182,0.3286,0.3774,0.2988,0.3249,0.2988,0.2988,0.2575,0.2503,0.2849,0.2817,0.2470,0.2470,0.2541,0.1583,0.1275,0.0719,0.0967,0.0888,0.1048,0.1476,0.2292,0.2292,0.2258,0.2094,0.1914,0.1349,0.0817,0.1028,0.0618,0.0662,0.0676,0.1373,0.1298,0.1298,0.2164,0.2715,0.2988,0.2541,0.3356,0.3149,0.3566,0.3631,0.3566,0.2951,0.3840,0.2752,0.2783,0.3566,0.3631,0.3740,0.3599,0.3566,0.2470,0.2470,0.2399,0.1942,0.1671,0.2470,0.2849,0.1852,0.1823,0.1702,0.1671,0.1528,0.1583,0.1554,0.1702,0.1554,0.1611,0.0835,0.1092,0.1048,0.0543,0.1007,0.0704,0.0646,0.0780,0.0780,0.0780,0.0473,0.0531,0.0555,0.0605,0.0405,0.0244,0.0349,0.0372,0.0749,0.0704,0.0749,0.1373,0.0985,0.0676,0.1251,0.0719,0.0581,0.0320,0.0171,0.0113,0.0102,0.0090,0.0125,0.0194,0.0188,0.0157,0.0244,0.0281,0.0269,0.0148,0.0235,0.0218,0.0218,0.0356,0.0581,0.0592,0.1092,0.1791,0.2680,0.3840,0.3566,0.3599,0.4901,0.4051,0.3356,0.3019,0.4051,0.4051,0.3840,0.3807,0.4725,0.3910,0.3599,0.3840,0.3983,0.3840,0.3053,0.2002,0.1323,0.1424,0.0870,0.1852,0.1007,0.0473,0.0473,0.0719,0.0835,0.0749,0.0734,0.0780,0.0483,0.0235,0.0424,0.0327,0.0281,0.0258,0.0258,0.0227,0.0349,0.0454,0.0433,0.0780,0.0543,0.1048,0.1184,0.1914,0.1206,0.0765,0.0870,0.0967,0.0494,0.0405,0.0473,0.0287,0.0433,0.0281,0.0294,0.0320,0.0690,0.0473,0.0662,0.0676,0.0306,0.0231,0.0191,0.0198,0.0120,0.0202,0.0269,0.0214,0.0130,0.0244,0.0473,0.0398,0.0306,0.0294,0.0463,0.0372,0.0356,0.0356,0.0372,0.0202,0.0191,0.0372,0.0631,0.0780,0.1251,0.1852,0.1731,0.1323,0.1501,0.2193,0.1969,0.2034,0.3286,0.4330,0.4292,0.3
